R

random - Variable in class resourceManager.BasicResourceManager
Generates random priority levels.
random - Variable in class resourceManager.ResourceUser
Used to determine the time for which this resource user requires a resource
releaseResource() - Method in interface resourceManager.ResourceManager
Release this manager's resource.
requestResource(int) - Method in interface resourceManager.ResourceManager
Request use of this manager's resource, with the specified priority.
resource - Variable in class resourceManager.BasicResourceManager
The resource manged by this resource manager.
Resource - Class in resourceManager
Models a resource, that will be used by ResourceUsers, and managed by a ResourceManager.
Resource(String) - Constructor for class resourceManager.Resource
Set the resource's name and determine the number of times it can be used.
ResourceError - Exception in resourceManager
Report errors arising from the management and use of resources.
ResourceError(String) - Constructor for exception resourceManager.ResourceError
 
resourceIsExhausted() - Method in class resourceManager.BasicResourceManager
Check whether the resource is exhausted.
resourceIsExhausted() - Method in interface resourceManager.ResourceManager
Check whether this manager's resource is exhausted.
resourceManager - package resourceManager
Implements and uses resource managers.
ResourceManager - Interface in resourceManager
A resource manger manages a single Resource, which may be used by any number of ResourceUsers.
ResourceSystem - Class in resourceManager
A resource system consists of a number of ResourceManagers, each managing an individual Resource, and a number of ResourceUsers, who wish to make use of the resources.
ResourceSystem() - Constructor for class resourceManager.ResourceSystem
Initialise the resource managers and resource users sets.
ResourceSystemMain - Class in resourceManager
Demonstrates the use of Resources, ResourceManagers and ResourceUsers in a ResourceSystem.
ResourceSystemMain() - Constructor for class resourceManager.ResourceSystemMain
 
ResourceUser - Class in resourceManager
A resource user may make use of any number of Resources, each of which is managed by a ResourceManager.
ResourceUser(String, double, Set<ResourceManager>) - Constructor for class resourceManager.ResourceUser
Set the name and maximum useage time, and initialise the resource managers.
run() - Method in class carpark.Arrivals
A continuous stream of cars entering the car park.
run() - Method in class carpark.Departures
A continuous stream of cars leaving the car park.
run() - Method in class resourceManager.ResourceSystem
Run this resource user.
run() - Method in class resourceManager.ResourceUser
Run this resource user.
